name: Life Reawakened (Formerly
offering: Afrin Razviting, Course Creation Training, Internet Marketing Course, Internet Marketing Expert, Marketing Expert, Online Course Creation, Speaker Promotion, Summit Creation
what_you_do: The Life Reawakened Show is a telesummit platform that hosts transformative conversations integrating wellness, spirituality, and personal empowerment, evolved from the former 'From Heartache To Joy' summit.
who_you_serve: Individuals seeking personal transformation, with a particular focus on empowering Muslim women to embrace their God-given rights.
social_proof: Founder Eram Saeed has empowered over 150 healers through her coaching program over the past 11 years; Co-Host Linda Arsenio had a leading role in the Bollywood feature Kabul Express.
signature_programs: Telesummit Super Star Coaching, The Life Reawakened Show
business_focus: Hosting transformative telesummits and coaching programs that empower healers and individuals through personal growth, spirituality, and cultural integration.
service_provided: Telesummit hosting, healer coaching program, transformative show production, personal empowerment content
